channel.title: Zirconium - The remakes should probably stop
channel.description:
[center][b][size=18pt]Zirconium[/size][/b][/center]
Welcome to Zirconium, an Apollo based 530 revision server. The goal of Zirconium is to create a fun and original economy based private server focusing largely on custom quests, Runescapesque skills, and challenging unique bosses. Ziconium is currently in an early stage of development due to being a side project during the past few weeks, but over that time we've developed some decent ideas for a server that we'd like to host. With the first semester of College coming to a close, and a month long break just around the corner, we feel that now is a great time to start serious development of the server. We plan on having the server hosted either in December or January (THE HOSTING DATE IS NOT SET IN STONE) with a few basic features, skills, and combat to get it started. We feel that waiting until everything is done will build up too much hype, and overall just drag down our morale towards finishing this server.
[size=12pt][b]Features:[/b][/size]
The things listed below are what we would like to have added by the time we get the server ready to host. As skills are added the features will be added in a list below that skill.
[b]Basic Features:[/b]
[ul][li]Login[/li] [li]Player Rendering[/li] [li]Multiplayer[/li] [li]NPC Rendering[/li] [li]Private Messaging[/li] [li]Basic Tutorial outlining some differences[/li][/ul]
[b]Combat:[/b]
[ul][li]Attack[/li] [li]Strength[/li] [li]Defence[/li] [li]Prayer[/li] [li]Ranged[/li] [li]Magic[/li][/ul]
[b]Skills:[/b]
[ul][li]Mining[/li] [li]Smithing[/li] [li]Fishing[/li] [li]Cooking[/li] [li]Woodcutting[/li] [li]Fletching[/li] [li]Crafting[/li][/ul]
[b]Shopping:[/b] With our shopping system we've decided to take a different route. We've avoided using the infinite shop stock since we're not too fond of the affect on the economy. We've also decided to exclude the "buy-50" option as it would drain the shop stock too fast with either a small or large player base.
[ul][li]Options buy 1, 5, 10[/li] [li]Correct Buying/Selling Values[/li] [li]Decrease Stock if over default[/li] [li]Increase Stock if under default[/li][/ul]
[b]Media:[/b]
[img]http://puu.sh/1tgMO.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1urL0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qCVHw.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/r1ijl.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ntCEK.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/cSod8.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5wNTE.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1v8nS.png[/img]
[b]Developers[/b]
[ul][li]Scully[/li] [li]Hybrent[/li][/ul]
[b]Credits:[/b]
[ul][li]Graham[/li] [li]Flamable[/li][/ul]

item.title: Zirconium - The remakes should probably stop
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

im all for multi world support and player data transferring

Read full topic
item.source: Zirconium - The remakes should probably stop

item.title: Zirconium - The remakes should probably stop
item.dc:creator: @hybrent hybrent
item.description:
@hybrent wrote:

Finished up shopping over the last couple of days - should be about 95% done. Completely usable in its current form and shops are added through ruby scripts for ease. Shops correctly restock over time (this will be slightly faster than on RS due to fewer worlds) and random items cannot be sold to specialty shops, but anything can be sold to general stores.

We have edited the access masks to allow for only the buy 1, 5, and 10 options as we are not having unlimited stocks due to economic implications.

cSod8.png768×533

Next up will be banking and then trading shortly after.

Read full topic
item.source: Zirconium - The remakes should probably stop

item.title: Zirconium - The remakes should probably stop
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:34, topic:469554”][quote author=Scully link=topic=586788.msg4173646#msg4173646 date=1354686345]
Well for updates today, there’s nothing really too amazing as far as pictures go. We added the button clicking, logout, and npc option packets, and then for lulz we thought, why not add the emote list.
[/quote]

This Thread needs a Developmental Log.

Example:

[quote]
Development Key:

SS = Server-sided

CS = Client-sided

Past Updates:

  • Player V.S. N.P.C. Combat removed from the Base. (SS)

  • Server contents packaged. (SS)

  • 40 new folders created in total. (SS)

  • Client class reduced to 184K.B. (SS)

  • Added a recreation of the 289 Revision’s Prayer Tab. (CS)

  • Player to Player Trading has been removed. (SS)

  • Text Method optimized for grammar purposes. (SS)

  • New Debugging methods added. (SS/CS)

  • Player to Player Following has been removed. (SS)

  • All Scroll-Bars have been removed. (CS)

  • Magic Tab cleaned out for the Tzhaar Magic Tab. (CS)

  • Potion and other UseItem Packet content has been removed. (SS)

  • Player Death has been removed. (SS)
    [/quote][/quote]

I mean, yeah, probably not going to add one, thanks for the suggestion though.

Read full topic

There was also an update server fix so more than one client can connect without denying connections.
